import React from 'react' import styles from './MainBoard.module.css' const MainBoard = props => { let forecast = {} switch(props.activeBoard){ case "current": forecast = props.forecast.current break case "hourly": forecast = props.forecast.hourly[props.activeHour] break case "daily": forecast = props.forecast.daily[props.activeDay] break default: forecast = props.forecast.current } return(

weather forecast

) } export default MainBoard
